TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Sima-un, title = Sima-un, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sima-un} }

S.FORM: Sima-un Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantou ko Sima-un a niyaro', 209 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 817 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 770 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 47 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun88%, Tayal3%, Seediq2%.

Sima-on Itiniay i Ren'ai Cen no Nantoo ko Sima-on a niyaro', 209 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 817 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 770 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 47 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon88%, Tayal3%, Seediq2%.
